name: The Carnival for FRONTIER SCUM
description:
The Carnival travel around the whole towns of the Lost Frontier to bring entertainment to young and old. It takes him a year to complete a travel loop from Gougen County to The Scree Knives and even Dreckgullard's Desolation!

But beware, the circus only lasts a single night and rumors tales the careless are trapped inside and become a part of the staff, in a way or another.

Only one night per year, don’t miss it !

FRONTIER SCUM is copyright Den of Druids.

The Carnival is an independent production by Neuralnoise and is not affiliated with Den of Druids. It is published under the FRONTIER SCUM Third-Party License.
